overview: A simple sundress that covers her red lingerie are all that Aria is wearing as she walks into the kitchen to grab some coffee. She doesn't make it to her goal before Raul has come up from behind to start peppering her neck and then her lips with kisses… • Hot little Latina Gina is ready to make Oliver drool. He sits in a chair, tied up and blindfolded, as Gina takes stock of all the various implements of pleasure at her disposal… • Zazie and Nikki are far away from one another as far as Zazie knows, but they've at least got video chat to help get them through their separation… • Eveline has gone for lace over leather as she dolls herself up in lingerie, sheer thigh highs, and high heels for Renato. She puts a trench coat over the sexy getup, then heads out to meet her lover…
title: Piece of Me
